pli-tv-bu-vb-as1:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-as1:1.1: Venerables, these seven principles for the settling of legal issues come up for recitation.
pli-tv-bu-vb-as1:2.1: “For the settling and resolving of legal issues whenever they arise there is:
pli-tv-bu-vb-as2:1.1: Resolution through recollection to be granted;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as3:1.1: Resolution because of past insanity to be granted;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as4:1.1: Acting according to what has been admitted;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:1.1: Covering over as if with grass.
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:2.1: Venerables, the seven principles for the settling of legal issues have been recited.
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:2.2: In regard to this I ask you,
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:2.8: You are pure in this and therefore silent. I will remember it thus.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:3.1: The seven principles for the settling of legal issues are finished.
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.2: the four rules on expulsion have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.3: the thirteen rules on suspension have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.4: the two undetermined rules have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.5: the thirty rules on relinquishment and confession have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.6: the ninety-two rules on confession have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.7: the four rules on acknowledgment have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.8: the rules to be trained in have been recited;
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.9: the seven principles for the settling of legal issues have been recited.
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.10: This much has come down and is included in the Monastic Code of the Buddha and comes up for recitation every half-month.
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:4.11: In regard to this everyone should train in unity, in concord, without dispute.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-as7:5.1: The monks’ rules and their analysis is finished.
